mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PLAN (ID, PLAN_NAME, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE, PLAN_DEADLINE, PLAN_MAX_PERSONNEL, PLAN_MIN_PERSONNEL, PLAN_PRICE, PLAN_START_ADDRESS, PLAN_CONTENT, PLAN_FILE_PATH, PLAN_FILE_SIZE, PLAN_FILE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, COURSE_ID) VALUES (SEQ_PLAN.NEXTVAL, #{planName}, #{planStartDate}, #{planEndDate}, #{planDeadline}, #{planMaxPersonnel}, #{planMinPersonnel}, #{planPrice}, #{planStartAddress} , #{planContent}, #{planFilePath}, #{planFileSize}, #{planFileName}, #{memberId}, #{courseId})
